anime.name: Puella Magi Madoka Magica
anime.category: Dark fantasy, Drama, Horror, Magical girl, Supernatural, Tragedy
anime.creator: Gen Urobuchi
anime.summary: She has a loving family and best friends, laughs and cries from time to time... Madoka Kaname, an eighth grader of Mitakihara middle school, is one of those who lives such a life. One day, she had a very magical encounter. She doesn't know if it happened by chance or by fate yet. This is a fateful encounter that can change her destinyâ€”this is a beginning of the new story of the magical witch girls.
